current_task: Recording Solr index restore failed - backup archive corrupted
blocked_on: Recording backup archive from data.metabrainz.org is corrupted - NoSuchFileException for index files
message: Recording index restore FAILED. The backup archive has corrupted/missing index files. This is an upstream issue with MusicBrainz backups. All other 14 collections work fine. PostgreSQL fully operational. InterChord can proceed without recording search - use PostgreSQL direct queries for tracks.

decisions: Using pre-built Solr backup archives instead of rebuilding indexes
Recording archive corrupted - multiple download attempts failed
Recommending PostgreSQL direct queries for track lookups
